title: Why the Tour de France Won’t Race Over Montmartre and Those Cyclocross Winter Games Rumors Are True
content:
Tour de Hoody: From the Eiffel Tower to Sacré-Coeur, road racing in Paris will be hard to match in scale and grandeur in future Olympic Games.

Read the full article at Why the Tour de France Won’t Race Over Montmartre and Those Cyclocross Winter Games Rumors Are True on Velo.
author: ahood
